datasets.name: UCI Adult Income Dataset
datasets.description: Predict whether an individual earns more than $50,000 per year based on demographic information.

datasets.name: Titanic Dataset
datasets.description: Predict survival on the Titanic based on passenger information.

datasets.name: Iris Dataset
datasets.description: Classify iris flowers into three species based on sepal and petal measurements.

datasets.name: Wine Quality Dataset
datasets.description: Predict wine quality based on physicochemical tests.

datasets.name: Heart Disease UCI
datasets.description: Predict the presence of heart disease based on various health metrics.
